content.question: The Black Codes passed in a number of southern states after the Civil War were intended to

choices.label: close public schools to the children of former slaves
promote the return of former slaves to Africa
enable Black citizens to vote in federal elections
place limits on the socioeconomic opportunities open to Black people
further the integration of southern society

content.answer: place limits on the socioeconomic opportunities open to Black people
